Tacoma.Salishan, Tacoma, Washington:
Salishan is a diverse and mixed-income neighborhood of Tacoma, Washington that was originally created as World War II housing project but, starting in 2002, has been demolished and rebuilt into a new neighborhood of homes, apartments, services, and parks on new infrastructure. It is located on Tacoma's eastside.


== Creation ==
The federal government created the community of Salishan during World War II to house workers in the area's war time industries and military personnel, and their families.
